Public Functions

These are functions that everyone can access.

.
add_paint_colour
void add_paint_colour(string colour,
int cost)
This method adds a paint colour to the shop and how much that colour costs to use. The cost for the colour is the cost per letter.

Parameters:
colour - the colour of the paint
cost - the cost of the paint
add_sign_making
void add_sign_making(string owner,
int type,
string mess,
string colour,
int pick_up)
This method adds a sign into the current list of signs to be made.

Parameters:
owner - the person who owns the sign
type - the type of the sign
mess - the message on the sign
colour - the colour of the sign
add_sign_type
void add_sign_type(string short,
string long,
int cost,
int weight,
int max_letters,
int max_lines)
This method adds the types of signs that are available.

Parameters:
short - the short description of the sign
cost - the base cost of the sign
weight - how heavy the sign is
max_letters - most letters
max_lines - the most lines

Parameters:
